title: Orbit Fab and ClearSpace to develop in-space refueling service
summary: Orbit Fab and ClearSpace see opportunities to work together on mission extension, transportation and other mobility and logistics services.

title: Expansion Raises €100M to Invest in European New Space Startups
summary:
Two years after its initial launch, European venture capital fund Expansion Ventures announced 23 January that it had raised €100 million. The fund was launched to support European New Space and New Air Mobility companies from seed rounds up to Series A and B funding rounds. According to Expansion, this initial tranche of funding garnered […]
The post Expansion Raises €100M to Invest in European New Space Startups appeared first on European Spaceflight.

title: Artemis Accords: Belgium Makes it 34
summary: Belgium became the 34th country to sign the Artemis Accords today. The Accords are a set of non-binding principles of responsible behavior on the Moon. Belgium joins ten other members […]

title: Belgium signs Artemis Accords
summary: Belgium has signed the Artemis Accords outlining best practices for responsible behavior in space exploration, becoming the latest major European space power to join.

title: U.S. bracing for tougher satellite radio wave negotiations
summary: It will become increasingly challenging to protect national interests during treaty-level talks over how radio waves should be allocated for satellite connectivity, according to the ambassador who led U.S. efforts at the 2023 World Radiocommunication Conference.
